attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst the work on the proposed A14 move looks to be coming together quite soon, why not help the villages of Southoe, Didington and Buckden by also building a bypass on this section of the A1 at the same time? During the A14 construction work these villages will suffer a great deal more with higher traffic congestion which does cause major problems now for villagers.There are very few parts of the A1 that now suffer as we do on the section from Baldock to Alconbury, we need some joined up thinking from the Transport Minister NOW.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
